name: Demo Day Finalist: Lizard Wizard Rescue
name_original: Demo Day Finalist: Lizard Wizard Rescue
description:
Lizard Wizard Rescue by Elena S.

Game Summary:

You play as a lizard wizard going on an adventure to save the prince tadpole from his evil toad uncle. There are multiple levels ranging from puzzle/mazes to boss fights.

Game Controls:

To enter full screen, click the expand icon on the bottom right

  • Arrow keys to run and jump
  • SPACE to shoot
